current.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers
current.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 3pm and 4pm. Partly sunny. High near 45, with temperatures falling to around 43 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 2 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nextSnow.name: Friday
nextSnow.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 7am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of snow showers between 7am and 8am, then patchy fog and a chance of rain and snow showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 45, with temperatures falling to around 43 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 1 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 3pm and 4pm. Partly sunny. High near 45, with temperatures falling to around 43 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 2 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: Areas of frost between 8pm and 10pm, then widespread frost and areas of fog. Partly cloudy, with a low around 29. West northwest wind around 2 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Light Rain
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 4am, then rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34. East southeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a high near 47. East wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
